footer.tagline: Infrastructure Automation Platform for AI-Driven Operations

hero.title: Infrastructure Automation Platform for
hero.subtitle: Accelerate development workflows with instant environment provisioning and production-like testing. Get accelerated development environments, next-generation disaster recovery, and AI-safe infrastructure operations.

problem.title: The Speed Mismatch Crisis
problem.subtitle: When production environments have terabytes of data but sandbox environments only sync monthly, teams face impossible choices that lead to dangerous workarounds.

reality.title: The Reality: Frustrated Teams, Dangerous Workarounds
reality.imageAlt: Diagram illustrating traditional infrastructure workflow challenges: frustrated developers waiting for environment provisioning, stakeholders demanding faster deployment, and teams resorting to dangerous production testing due to slow sandbox updates

solution.title: The Solution: Rediacc Platform
solution.imageAlt: Rediacc platform solution diagram: automated infrastructure provisioning, instant production-like environment clones, streamlined developer workflows, and AI-safe operations with Model Context Protocol integration

solutions.title: Three Converging Solutions
solutions.subtitle: Rediacc addresses the speed mismatch with instant infrastructure operations designed for the AI era.

items.title: Accelerated Development Operations
items.description: Instant environment provisioning for testing, staging, and development. No more waiting hours or days for production-like environments.
benefits: Environment setup from days to minutes

items.title: Next-Generation Disaster Recovery
items.description: Continuous, lightweight snapshots enable rapid restoration with minimal infrastructure overhead using Smart deduplication storage architecture.
benefits: Minutes instead of hours for recovery

items.title: AI-Safe Infrastructure Operations
items.description: Native support for Model Context Protocol (MCP) enabling AI systems like Claude Code and Gemini to safely interact with infrastructure through instant production clones.
benefits: Safe sandbox environments for AI experimentation
